content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a wooden chest at position (x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.
### Stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) for smelting stone into iron plates.
### Coal transportation at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) for transporting coal from the chest at position (x=44.5, y=-81.5) to the chest at position (x=43.5, y=-79.5).
### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (x=43.5, y=-79.5) for storing coal.
### Coal storage at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (x=44.5, y=-81.5) for storing coal.
### Coal storage at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (x=45.5, y=-80.5) for storing coal.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item being extracted before attempting to extract it.
### Errors when a chest is full
- Empty the chest before attempting to mine or insert items into it.
### Errors when inserting coal into a drill
- Ensure the drill is not out of fuel before inserting coal.
### Errors when using a burner inserter
- Ensure the inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to use it.
